mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.url, (select `status` from boot_sys_resource_audit b where del_flag = 0 and a.id = b.resource_id order by create_date limit 1) as `status`, a.code, a.remark, a.tags, (select process_instance_id from boot_sys_resource_audit b where del_flag = 0 and a.id = b.resource_id order by create_date limit 1) as process_instance_id from boot_sys_resource a where a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update boot_sys_resource set del_flag = '1' where id = #{id}
